name: talentless.
description:
talentless, a Yume Nikki fan game created for the Dream Diary 4 game jam, which follows a protagonist that goes by Lumi. 

Currently has 4 effects to get and subworlds(?) to explore, and there is a 5th effect and ending planned, but due to time constraints, this is as much as I can do.  All 4 effects are cosmetic and you can actually unequip them and switch in-between effects.
